title: Wendell Pierce On The Timeless Themes Of Inequality In "Death of a Salesman"
description:
Wendell Pierce stars in a new Broadway production of "Death of a Salesman," in which his character Willy Loman is African American, serving to heighten the play's message about institutional violence and the unattainable American Dream. "Death of a Salesman" is playing now at the Hudson Theater.
